Classes

class  fsdict::UTF8_Codecvt
 This is a custom implementation of a codecvt facet for utf-8, as it does not seem to be present on all systems (especially WIN). More...

namespace  fsdict
 

This namespace covers a system of modules for string processing.


Defines

#define FSDICT_UTF8_LOCALE   ( std::locale( std::locale( "" ), new fsdict::UTF8_Codecvt() ) )
 This is a convenience macro to create a new locale with most of the system's standard locale but with the csl_internal utf8 codecvt facet.

#define FSDICT_UTF8_LOCALE   ( std::locale( std::locale( "" ), new fsdict::UTF8_Codecvt() ) )

This is a convenience macro to create a new locale with most of the system's standard locale but with the csl_internal utf8 codecvt facet.
